Motivation.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
Motivation.author: Charles Kingsleigh

Motivation.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Motivation.author: Robert Collier

Motivation.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Motivation.author: Sam Levenson

Motivation.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
Motivation.author: Anonymous

Motivation.quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
Motivation.author: Anonymous

Motivation.quote: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
Motivation.author: Anonymous

Motivation.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Motivation.author: Anonymous

Motivation.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Motivation.quote: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
Motivation.author: Anonymous

Success.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Success.author: Walt Disney

Success.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Success.author: Henry David Thoreau

Success.quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
Success.author: Napoleon Hill

Success.quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
Success.author: Chris Grosser

Success.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
Success.author: William Butler Yeats

Success.quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
Success.author: Colin Powell

Success.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Success.author: Abraham Lincoln

Success.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Success.author: Thomas Jefferson

Happiness.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
Happiness.author: Dalai Lama

Happiness.quote: For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
Happiness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Happiness.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
Happiness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Happiness.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
Happiness.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Happiness.quote: The happiest people don't have the best of everything, they just make the best of everything.
Happiness.author: Anonymous

Happiness.quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
Happiness.author: Albert Camus

Happiness.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
Happiness.author: Omar Khayyam

Happiness.quote: To be happy, we must not be too concerned with others.
Happiness.author: Albert Camus

Love.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
Love.author: Aristotle

Love.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
Love.author: David Viscott

Love.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
Love.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

Love.quote: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
Love.author: Jodi Picoult

Love.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
Love.author: Lao Tzu

Love.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every day.
Love.author: Anonymous

Love.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
Love.author: Nicholas Sparks

Love.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
Love.author: Audrey Hepburn

Love.quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
Love.author: Loretta Young

Perseverance.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
Perseverance.author: Walter Elliot

Perseverance.quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
Perseverance.author: Colin Powell

Perseverance.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Perseverance.author: Confucius

Perseverance.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
Perseverance.author: Vince Lombardi

Perseverance.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
Perseverance.author: Nelson Mandela

Perseverance.quote: Perseverance is the key to overcoming obstacles.
Perseverance.author: Anonymous

Perseverance.quote: A quitter never wins and a winner never quits.
Perseverance.author: Napoleon Hill

Perseverance.quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
Perseverance.author: Anonymous

Perseverance.quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
Perseverance.author: Julie Andrews

Perseverance.quote: Don't give up. Don't ever give up.
Perseverance.author: Jim Valvano

Focus.quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination.
Focus.author: Greg Anderson

Focus.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
Focus.author: Bruce Lee

Focus.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Focus.author: Robert Collier

Focus.quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
Focus.author: Mark Twain

Focus.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Focus.author: Abraham Lincoln

Focus.quote: Concentration is the secret of strength.
Focus.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Focus.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
Focus.author: Tim Ferriss

Focus.quote: Focus is the key to unlocking your potential.
Focus.author: Anonymous

Focus.quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
Focus.author: William Faulkner

Focus.quote: Focus on the possibilities for success, not on the potential for failure.
Focus.author: Anonymous

Leadership.quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It’s about taking care of those in your charge.
Leadership.author: Simon Sinek

Leadership.quote: A good leader leads the people from above them. A great leader leads the people from within them.
Leadership.author: Mabel Newcomer

Leadership.quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
Leadership.author: Warren Bennis

Leadership.quote: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
Leadership.author: Ray Kroc

Leadership.quote: Leadership is not about being the best. It’s about making everyone else better.
Leadership.author: Anonymous

Leadership.quote: A true leader doesn’t create followers, they create more leaders.
Leadership.author: Anonymous

Leadership.quote: Leadership is not about being the boss, it’s about showing the way.
Leadership.author: Anonymous

Leadership.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Leadership.author: Abraham Lincoln

Leadership.quote: Leadership is about influence, not authority.
Leadership.author: John C. Maxwell

Leadership.quote: Leadership is the ability to get extraordinary achievement from ordinary people.
Leadership.author: Brian Tracy

Self-Improvement.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Self-Improvement.author: Steve Jobs

Self-Improvement.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Self-Improvement.author: John D. Rockefeller

Self-Improvement.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
Self-Improvement.author: Zig Ziglar

Self-Improvement.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
Self-Improvement.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Self-Improvement.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
Self-Improvement.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Self-Improvement.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
Self-Improvement.author: Jim Rohn

Self-Improvement.quote: Growth is the great separator between those who succeed and those who do not.
Self-Improvement.author: John C. Maxwell

Self-Improvement.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Self-Improvement.author: Abraham Lincoln

Self-Improvement.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
Self-Improvement.author: Albert Einstein

Self-Improvement.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
Self-Improvement.author: Roy T. Bennett

Random.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
Random.author: Charles Kingsleigh

Random.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Random.author: Winston Churchill

Random.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
Random.author: Aristotle

Random.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Random.author: Confucius

Random.quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination.
Random.author: Greg Anderson

Random.quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
Random.author: Julie Andrews

Random.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
Random.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Random.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Random.author: Abraham Lincoln

Random.quote: Leadership is the ability to get extraordinary achievement from ordinary people.
Random.author: Brian Tracy

Random.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Random.author: Steve Jobs
